body: All plants within a 1-mile radius of you grow at double their normal rate and don't suffer from any diseases or maladies. Furthermore, allied plant creatures within 30 feet of you gain fast healing equal to your tier. If you use plant shape or wild shape to take the form of a plant, you gain this fast healing in plant form.
name: Plantbringer
url: pfsrd://Mythic Adventures/Rules/Mythic Heroes/Hierophant/Hierophant Features/1st-Tier Hierophant Path Abilities/Plantbringer
